inactivity_rule.description: All accounts will be deactivated after 30 days of inactivity.
requirements: Log in and maintain an active connection to avoid deactivation
consequences: Once deactivated, accounts cannot be restored

all_or_nothing.description: All or nothing practices are prohibited.

requirements: Traders must ensure that the average duration of all their trades exceeds 2 minutes.
At least 50% of the requested profit must come from trades that exceed 2 minutes.

order_block_spamming.description: Entering multiple orders in a short period of time is prohibited.

qualified_analyst_accounts.trading_window_rule: If a trade is initiated within 2 minutes before or up to 2 minutes after a news release (a 4-minute window), its duration must exceed 2 minutes for the trade to be valid.

alpha_pro_8_10_accounts.restriction: Trading around high-impact news is restricted to 2 minutes before or after the news release.

alpha_one_pro_6_three_accounts.restriction: Trading around high-impact news is restricted to 5 minutes before or after the news release.

evaluation_program.restriction: News trading is allowed in all evaluation program without any restriction.

drawdown_adjustment_alpha_one.rule: If your 6% trailing Max Drawdown resets to the initial balance after reaching a 6% profit, maintain a profit buffer to keep trading.
drawdown_adjustment_alpha_one.consequence: Withdrawing all profits will result in account closure.

risk_management.rule: Consistently losing or risking 2% or more in a single trade or sequence of trades closed around the same time is prohibited.

qualified_analyst_allocation.definition: Maximum allocation per trading strategy on a Qualified Analyst Account.
qualified_analyst_allocation.strategy_definition: "Strategy" is defined as the assets themselves.

requirements: Proof of ownership is required if Alpha capital account is to be treated as slave

prop_firm_one_partnership.functionality: Allows traders to seamlessly copy trades across different proprietary firm accounts within a single platform
prop_firm_one_partnership.restriction: Without breaching Alpha Capital's core rules

maximum_lot_sizes.note: Alpha One, Alpha Pro 6%, Alpha Pro 8/10% and Alpha Three have the same lot size limits

biweekly_payout_details.first_payout_requirement: Minimum of 5 trading days using the same trading strategy

requirements: Have at least 2% of gross profits in the account balance
two_percent_on_demand_details.best_day_rule: 40% Best Day Rule: No single trading day can contribute more than 40% of total profits

plan_restrictions.alpha_swing_alpha_one: Only the 2% On Demand option is available

alpha_one.drawdown_rule: 6% trailing Max Drawdown with reset rules
